commit.message:
varasm.c (assemble_variable): Create DECL_RTL before setting TREE_ASM_WRITTEN.

        * varasm.c (assemble_variable): Create DECL_RTL before setting
        TREE_ASM_WRITTEN.

From-SVN: r44372

files.patch:
